Instead of the usual three or four times, the vodka was distilled an infinite number of times. 100 years later, it was reintroduced as Absolut. Just as then, Absolut is produced in Ahus, L.O. Dove Original Beauty Cream Bar combines a gentle cleansing formula with our signature 1\/4 moisturising cream to give you softer, smoother, healthier-looking skin.
